content: That's a great checklist! I'll make sure to go through it before the trip to ensure my road bike is in top condition. By the way, speaking of accessories, I recently got a new pair of cycling shoes with clipless pedals, which have taken some getting used to but have improved my pedaling efficiency. I'm thinking of bringing them along on the trip, but I'm not sure if I should bring my clipless pedals as well or just stick with the platform pedals on my hybrid bike. What do you think?
